name: Browserbase
description: Browserbase credential setup helpers with dynamic skill sync from browserbase/skills.

apiKey.label: Browserbase API Key
apiKey.help: Get your key from browserbase.com/settings or use ${BROWSERBASE_API_KEY}.

projectId.label: Browserbase Project ID

promptOnStart.label: Prompt On Startup

autoSyncSkills.label: Auto Sync Skills
autoSyncSkills.help: Automatically sync browser-automation/functions skills from github:browserbase/skills when missing.
